raw: Aust virus cases pass 1000 after NSW jump .
replaced: Aust virus cases pass 1000 after NSW jump .

raw: The number of coronavirus cases in NSW has ballooned to 436 after 83 new cases were identified in the state , taking the national total past the 1000 mark .
replaced: The number of coronavirus cases in NSW has The increase to 436 after 83 new cases were identified in NSW , taking the national total past the 1000 mark .

raw: The increase comes as the NSW government discovered four cases of cruise ships disembarking in Sydney having had infected passengers on board .

raw: It represents a spike in the number of new COVID-19 diagnoses - with 46 recorded in NSW in the 24 hours to 8 pm Thursday night before the 83 new cases were discovered in the 24 hours up until 8 pm Friday night .

raw: " The majority of cases diagnosed in NSW were either acquired overseas or are a contact of a known case , " NSW Health said .

raw: " Seventy - four cases have been locally acquired without an identified source of infection .

raw: Investigations to establish any links between cases in order to prevent further spread are ongoing . "

raw: Meanwhile , NSW Health is scrambling to contact thousands of people who were onboard four cruise ships which visited Sydney this month , which carried passengers which were infected with coronavirus .

raw: It comes a day after it was revealed that the Ruby Princess ship was allowed to dock in Sydney with four people carrying the potentially deadly virus .

raw: Like the Ruby Princess , in all cases passengers were allowed to disembark without being tested .

raw: Two of the cases happened on two separate journeys of the Voyager of the Seas , with the other two cases coming on the Ovation of the Seas and the Celebrity Solstice .
